metadata.title: USN-5347-1 -- OpenVPN vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that OpenVPN incorrectly handled certain configurations with multiple authentication plugins. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to bypass authentication using incomplete credentials.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5347-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  openvpn - 2.4.7-1ubuntu2.20.04.4 No subscription required
